alert.note: Alert for Harris; Montgomery (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 7:42PM CST until January 31 at 10:30PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... East Fork San Jacinto near New Caney affecting Montgomery, Harris and Liberty Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Peach Creek at Splendora affecting Montgomery and Harris Counties. For the East Fork San Jacinto River...including New Caney, Cleveland...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Peach Creek...including Splendora...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Peach Creek at Splendora. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding continues as a residential yard on the upstream left bank begins to take on water and Goodson Road beginsto take on water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Sunday the stage was 14.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM CST Sunday was 14.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.3 feet late tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.6 feet on 01/16/1974. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (9 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Peach Creek Splendora 14.0 14.7 Sun 7 pm CST 14.9 13.1 10.4 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 745 AM CST.
